resources.string: This app is a camera app. But, this is not just a camera. Taking photos with this app, Your pet who lives in the app grow!!
First of all, please take a photo. You can take a photo by simply tapping the preview screen.Please tap below button to return to the game screen.
In the game screen, the photo you took has afloat. Please try to move the pet Flick the screen. Pet will eat photo (does\'t disappear photos stored on smartphone).
How to move the pet is to flick downwards. Then, pets will bounce in at the bottom. It works when you flick slowly close to the pet. It works quickly that it is far away.
Bait Number eaten within 3 hours and satisfaction is upper left. EXP is the top right. The number of remaining bait is under. The pet\'age and type is bottom.
There are many way for pets of experience point add. Take a picture (10pt/1). Feeding the photos (1pt/1). On Twitter or Facebook, you post your CameraPet\'s pet (20 pt /1).
Cute. Sometimes cute and disgusting. You can grow to various pet in your upbringing. Please grow together with your friends. Let\'s fun various pet with this app.
Weight:about melon\nLength:A little longer than pencil case\nFavorite:Smell of owner
Length:A little longer than pencil case
Dog that was picked up in the park. But, one day, He began to suddenly fly in the sky. Moreover, He starts eating photos.
I"'"m glad to meet the owner"'"s!
Tap the screen, you can take a picture.
SNS app is not installed. Please download the SNS apps on Google Play.
Number of bait is zero. If you post my growth record to SNS,or take pictures, you can get more bait!
Dog that grows head and feet from Mt. Fuji. Foreigners rejoice as "Oh! FUJIYAMA!". But, Japanese are surprised at this dog.
He seems American. But, like this dog don"'"t live in the US. In the near future, he may fight evil as a watchdog of the world.
Dog wearing a stone wall of castle. It seems difficult to walk, but he doesn"'"t care. If he is touched stone, he delight
He is not good at summer. As soon as return from outside, he must enter in the freezer. Because he disappears and melts.
I"'"m full. Thank you! EXP has been increased 20!
Thank you for letting me everyone to know of me. EXP and the rest of the food has been increased 20!
Hey I thought. I wanna fly fast like airplane.

I think to try to confess to the favorite beautiful woman dog.
I think that It was really good to have met you.
In fact, I"'"ve been broken heart ...
What is your favorite season? I like spring.
I"'"ve seen your secret. But, I don"'"t tell anyone.

You and I will be fine at night
I want to buy a large amount favorite dish.
I"'"ll want to go to the hot springs.
And stroked be too much to fall out hair.
Your stroking is very good.So I likely be a habit.
It is like to you to touch!
Ass is itchy. Please stroking the buttocks.
I might embarrassing when seen pet picture book ... Only joking.
My dislike is the shower. Because, since lightning is scary.
In the afternoon, you seem to be tired.But, you look fine at night. Why?
I like the time that school or company ends.Because, you are playing with me.
At home, I can relax.Are you same?
If We have traffic congestion at night, Are you tired?
Why does humans become wild at night?
McDonald is crowded at lunch. I"'"m unpleasant.
I"'"m very sleepy afternoon too eat lunch.
Tell you the truth, I have difficulty flying in the morning. As a reason for that is heavy body.
Oh! No, no, Since the morning sunlight is bright, I could hardly keep my eyes open.
In the morning, a stray cat had quarrel at garbage dump. They are young!
